plot: It seems a simple act, to weave a basket. But as you watch and listen, the women of the Ngwao Boswa Basket Weavers' Cooperative weave the strands of their stories as well: of women's lives and village lives, of tradition and change.
title: Ngwao Boswa
plot_es: It seems a simple act, to weave a basket. But as you watch and listen, the women of the Ngwao Boswa Basket Weavers' Cooperative weave the strands of their stories as well: of women's lives and village lives, of tradition and change.
plot_en: It seems a simple act, to weave a basket. But as you watch and listen, the women of the Ngwao Boswa Basket Weavers' Cooperative weave the strands of their stories as well: of women's lives and village lives, of tradition and change.
